```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(maps)
library(leaflet)
library(sf)
getwd()
all.sites.gwl <- read.csv("../Processed/gwl.sites.joined.csv")
all.sites.gwl <- all.sites.gwl %>% dplyr::select(-X)

all.sites.gwl.static <- all.sites.gwl %>%
  group_by(SiteNo) %>%
  summarise(Long = median(DecLongVa),
            Lat = median(DecLatVa),
            DTW = mean(Depth.to.Water.Below.Land.Surface.in.ft.)
            )

all.sites.gwl.spatial <- st_as_sf(all.sites.gwl, coords = c("DecLongVa", "DecLatVa"), crs = 4326)


```

  addTiles()%>%

                   stroke = FALSE, 
                   fillOpacity = 0.3,
                   popup = ~as.character(`SiteNo`))
